channel.title: Pk Series Instant Pk
channel.description:
Pk Series All about Pk HOME PAGE [url=http://www.crandorscape.netne.net]www.crandorscape.netne.net[/url] Server Features
-Instant Level (::master, ::pure)
-Vote4Reward system (::vote)
-Squeal of Fortune
-TAG ADDING (::settag King of Apple)
-Donor Points,Rank,Island,Gear
-Instant money making (simple milk the cow and sell the bucket of milk to farmer)
-PVP ITEMS earned by killing players or by vote
-Webclient
-Forum
BECAUSE OF THE NEW 700+ ITEMS WE FEATURE THE FEMALE GENDER HAS BEEN DISABLED.
If you don't like pvp servers, this is not the place for you.
PVP PLAYERS ARE WELCOME
I WILL LET THE PICTURES TO TALK ABOUT THE SERVER
[img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/791/pk1n.png[/img] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/839/pk2h.png[/img] [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/4445/pk3a.png[/img] [img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8875/pk4.png[/img] [img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8875/pk4.png[/img] [img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/7995/pk5g.png[/img] [img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/4456/pk6m.png[/img] [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/4330/pk7z.png[/img] [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/7330/pk8.png[/img] [img]http://img502.imageshack.us/img502/1994/pk9.png[/img] [img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/5649/pk10m.png[/img] [img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/7217/pk11j.png[/img]
NEED ADMIN AND MODSMod/Admin Work to do with server: -advert -be nice -help others(new players) -pk maniac -open minded -respect owner and other mods or admins -active on forum -find and report Players,Mods,Admins for rule broking and report all bugs and glitches to get fixed
AND THE AGE OF 16+
If you have a good idea to improve the server come and join online or forum. Reply here with your name that you will log-in.
